title: ‘Yellowjackets’ Season 2, Episode 7 Review: Lightning Crashes
description: A chilling, powerful episode of Yellowjackets that sees the show return to its former glory with outstanding performances and one truly hilarious Misty scene.

title: 3 Dead Giveaways You’re Dealing With A Wokefisher, According To A Psychologist
description: What do you do when you can’t tell if someone is faking their “wokeness” just to get with you?

title: Stunning Android 14 Feature Will Bring A Massive Google Photos Upgrade
description: Google Photos will be one of the first apps to take advantage of Android's stunning new HDR photo technology.

title: Tesla Ordered By China To Fix Crash Risk In 1.1 Million Vehicles
description: These Tesla models that were manufactured from January 12, 2019 through April 24, 2023, may not provide drivers adequate warning when they step on the accelerator pedal too hard or for too long.

title: See How This AI Prototype Can Detect Asian Hornets And Protect Bees
description: Pollenize and Encord partnered to develop an Asian Hornet device that could help save bees in the UK. The prototye device uses artificial intelligence and computer vision to detect Asian Hornets and notify authorities.

title: Why A ‘Humane’ Label On Meat And Eggs Means Very Little
description: "Currently consumers are being blindfolded."

title: Survival Of The Fattest: Heaviest Parrot Nestlings Survive Better
description: Juvenile survival of critically Endangered orange-bellied parrots was positively correlated with nestling body condition

title: America’s Gun Violence Is A Public Health Emergency, But Politics And The Courts Prevent A Proper Response
description: Gun violence is a leading cause of premature death in the U.S. In 2021, more than 48,000 Americans died from guns. Repeated attempts to introduce gun control measures have run into formidable opposition in the U.S. Congress as well as the judiciary.

title: Sleep Apnea Puts Adults At A 75% Higher Long Covid Risk
description: A recent study that analyzed the data of 2.2 million Americans with Covid-19 warned that those who have sleep apnea might be at a 75% higher risk of developing long Covid compared to those who do not struggle with sleep disorders.

title: ‘Superman And Lois’ Season 4 Likely To Move To HBO Max If The CW Cancels It
description: Some potentially positive news about Superman and Lois season 4, a show that deserves to be saved.

title: ‘The Legend Of Zelda: Tears Of The Kingdom’ Runs Rough, Looks Good (For The Switch)
description: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is a great game hamstrung by poor performance on Switch hardware.

title: Apple TV Plus’ ‘Silo’ Is Rapidly Becoming The Best Sci-Fi Shows On TV
description: Silo, on Apple TV Plus, is an incredible sci-fi series in a TV landscape where the genre is nearing death.

title: Destiny 2’s Season Of The Deep Is Facing Some Massive Release Date Competition
description: While Destiny 2 is more or less married to its seasonal schedule, unless some expansion delay causes an unplanned extension, that can sometimes mean new seasons fall at…inopportune times.

title: CDC: Highly Contagious, Drug-Resistant Ringworm Reported In U.S. For First Time
description: There already has been an ongoing epidemic of Trichophyton indotineae, a highly contagious and drug-resistant fungus, in South Asia.

title: Netflix’s ‘Queen Cleopatra’ Appears To Have The Worst Audience Score In TV History
description: Queen Cleopatra has not just the lowest audience score in Netflix history, it has essentially the lowest audience score possible on Rotten Tomatoes, a 1%. Not a 10%, a 1%.

title: Ferrari Shares Advance As Purosangue, Special Editions Promise Fat Profits
description: Ferrari keeps on surprising investors by outperforming profit estimates and as the new Purosangue SUV goes on sale the company’s stock price has been barreling ahead. Profits will also be bolstered by sales of special editions like the Daytona. The shares have accelerated by nearly 70% since July.

title: Why It’s Time To Rethink Fashion’s Biodiversity Strategy
description: Biodiversity loss and ecosystem collapse is pinned by the World Economic Forum as one of the world’s top risks over the next decade, but business as usual is fuelling the degradation of nature. Is the fashion industry paying attention?

title: The Beosound A5 Is Bang & Olufsen’s Best Portable Speaker Ever
description: Bang & Olufsen has been delighting audiophiles for almost 100 years. The company's latest speaker is the Beosound A5, a delightful sounding wireless speaker with two distinctive Scandi designs.

title: ‘Dota 2’ 7.33c Patch Notes Bring Major Nerfs To Top Heroes And Items
description: Ahead of the final DPC tour getting underway the Dota 2 team has made some more changes, this time nerfing some of the strongest heroes and items in the game.

title: Today’s Wordle #694 Hints, Clues And Answer For Sunday, May 14th
description: Tips, hints, clues to help you solve your daily Wordle. Also, play competitive Wordle against your friends, Wordle Bot or against me!

title: Forget The New MacBook Pro, Apple Has Something Much Better
description: If you are looking at the latest MacBook Pro, you should think again. There's a much better hiding on Apple's website.

title: Did Tesla Kill The Model 3? A Lesson For General Motors (And The Chevy Bolt)
description: GM has killed all its EVs: the EV1, the Spark EV, the Volt, and now the Bolt. A dubious accomplishment.

title: Daniel Penny Raises $1.3 Million On Crowdfunding Site After Being Charged In Chokehold Killing Of Jordan Neely
description: Attorneys for Daniel Penny, the man charged with manslaughter in the chokehold killing of Jordan Neely on a New York subway earlier this month, have raised over $1.3 million on the crowdfunding site GiveSendGo.

title: Today’s ‘Quordle’ Answers And Clues For Sunday, May 14
description: Some hints and the solution for today's 'Quordle' are just ahead.
